ModulesÂ¶

To employ some popular force fields, GALAMOST accommodate the potential functions which are listed in this subsection. They are classified into

  • MD-SCF
  • Polymerization
    • Polymerization model
    • Depolymerization model
  • Anisotropic particle
    • Gay-Berne model
      • GB interaction
      • Bond Force of GB particles
    • Soft anisotropic model
      • Interaction
      • Thermostat
  • Dissipative particle dynamics
    • DPD force
    • GWVV integration
